item.description:
Race 4 of the Will Run For Beer series.  The race starts at 10am in Exeter, NH at Margaritas Restaurant, but we'll meet in Braintree at 8am (location to be determined closer to race) and can carpool up.

***THIS RACE WILL SELL OUT IN ADVANCE***

If you do want to attend, please register online asap. 

$25 registration fee.  Race details, course description, and link to online registration at: http://www.locorunning.com/Margaritas5K.php

 

Margaritas 5K

Mexican Fiesta

May 1, 2011

Bienvenidos - Welcome to the third annual Margaritas 5K, and Mexican Fiesta run- the only 5K Fiesta held north of Guadalajara Mexico. At the Tia Juans' Margaritas 5K you'll experience the energy and taste of Mexico, an authentic fun-filled journey through a wonderfully colorful culture. Our post Race Fiesta will let you savor the food and traditional music, while surrounded by authentic hand-crafted furnishings from Mexico in Margaritas restaurant.

Premio - AWARDS: T-shirts to all pre-registered entrants- Prizes. 10 year age groups for men and women

Salida - START: 10:00 AM sharp on Sunday May 1, 2011. Report to the starting line by 9:50.

  

Meta - After the race -

join us for a traditional Mexican celebration featuring Authentic Mexican Cuisine inside our host Margaritas.

NEW: Join us for an after-race Margarita!

(must be 21 or older)
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in Braintree to carpool

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Margaritas 5K (Runners and Walkers welcome)
